\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 53672}

\subsection*{Near Death}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Mikeyboy}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 140 mg & oral & Methadone & daily\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 & 8.0 mg & sublingual & Pharms - Buprenorphine & pill / tablet\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 & 2.0 mg & sublingual & Naloxone & pill / tablet\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 200.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I'm on 140 mgs of methadone and one day decided to do 5 bags of heroin. I fell asleep at about 1a.m. and woke up at 3:30 a.m. still feeling a little high, nevertheless, I decided to try the Suboxone n8 pill. The worst experience I have ever felt and I've been on methadone for 20 years. I put the pill under my tongue like the guy said. By the way, I did buy it on the street from a complete stranger who told me that the next time, if I even had the smallest urge to do heroin this n8 pill would've cut the craving completely. I thought I was going to die when I took this pill.

\end{document}
